Some of the tests use Moq which can be found here: http://code.google.com/p/moq/
The tests have been built and run against Moq 4.0 Beta 2 which can be found here: http://code.google.com/p/moq/downloads/detail?name=Moq.4.0.10501.6-bin.zip&can=1&q=

The Moq.dll and moq.silverlight.dll must be placed in this folder.
